definition: to sit in a circle/seated around (a narrator)
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: You picture the family by the fire, the student lighting and relighting his pipe.
sentences.chinese: 想到圍坐在爐火旁的一家人，一個不斷點菸斗的學者。

sentences.english: Most of the time we sit around playing cards .
sentences.chinese: 大多數時間我們圍坐着打牌。

sentences.english: Silver-headed men sit around kerosene heaters.
sentences.chinese: 滿頭銀髮的男人圍坐在煤油暖氣機。

sentences.english: We eat chicken wings and sit by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我們圍坐在爐火邊喫着雞翅。

sentences.english: Sit down at a table while eating.
sentences.chinese: 喫飯時應圍坐在餐桌旁邊。

sentences.english: Thirty years ago, families gathered around a radio each evening.
sentences.chinese: 三十年前，家家戶戶每天晚上圍坐着聽收音機。

sentences.english: Sit in at the knitting circle down at the yarn shop.
sentences.chinese: 在紗支小店裏圍坐一圈做做針線。

sentences.english: The three of us sat around a table on a balcony overlooking the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 我們三人圍坐在陽臺的桌子旁，俯瞰着院子。

sentences.english: The drawing room was full of silent people, sitting at a long and ornate table. The.
sentences.chinese: 客廳裏都是人，安靜的圍坐在一張華麗的長桌邊。

sentences.english: The fondest memories are made when gathered around the table.
sentences.chinese: 最美妙的回想都是當各人圍坐在桌子當中。

sentences.english: Most sat around, waiting for instructions from an authority figure.
sentences.chinese: 當時大多數人圍坐在一起等着一個權威人物下達命令。

sentences.english: They sat round the table and made this big decision.
sentences.chinese: 他們圍坐在會議桌旁，作出了這個重大的決定。

sentences.english: They sat around the campfire telling tall tales about their hunting adventures.
sentences.chinese: 他們圍坐在篝火旁講着自己狩獵冒險的奇聞。

sentences.english: Every night we sit down at the table and have dinner together as a family (with no TV).
sentences.chinese: 每晚我們關掉電視機，一家人圍坐在桌旁喫晚飯。

sentences.english: They are gathered around a cypress tree which still stands.
sentences.chinese: 他們圍坐在一棵檜樹邊，那棵樹至今還依然屹立於此。

sentences.english: They sat together and chatted as they ate breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 一家人圍坐在一起，邊喫早飯邊聊天。
